item.title: Aft Cargo Compartment Heat Temperature Control – (Sidewall Switches) Two-Valve Installation

remarks.para: Both switches may be inoperative provided AFT CARGO HT remains OFF.

note.para: UPS Aircraft N580UP-N583UP have only one position switch 40° F installed.

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to Aft Cargo Heat switch "LEAVE OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: On UPS Aircraft N580UP-N583UP, there is one sidewall switch selector located immediately forward of the bulk door. The low temperature sidewall switch is hard wired to the 40° F temperature position (Ref Cargolux EA 747-21-29).
